name: 3D Land Mine Truck Parking - Real Army Mine-field Driving Simulator Game FREE
name_original: 3D Land Mine Truck Parking - Real Army Mine-field Driving Simulator Game FREE
description:
Drive your Army truck through a minefield in this intense parking game. It seems easy enough, just park your truck in the designated spot. But can you maneuver through a densely packed minefield? One wrong turn and it’s BOOM! Game Over. Do you have what it takes?

Features:
- 3 Military off Road vehicle
- Amazing explosion effects
- Real truck physics with independent suspension
- Realistic 3D graphics
